script.visual_description: Wide shot of a young developer, Alex (28, glasses, messy hair, laptop bag), hunched over a desk cluttered with screens showing frantic code for a healthcare app. She rubs her temples in frustration, ethical dilemma icons (privacy locks, bias warnings) flickering red on her monitor. Camera slowly zooms in on her worried face.
script.audio_cue: Tense, pulsating electronic music builds uncertainty.
